tool_description: Calories burned calculator for hundreds of different sports/activities. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/caloriesburned.
name: Calories Burned by API-Ninjas
title: Calories Burned by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/caloriesburned
api_list.description: API Ninjas Calories Burned API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: activity
required_parameters.description: name of the given activity. This value can be partial (e.g. ski will match water skiing and downhill skiing)

optional_parameters.name: weight
optional_parameters.description: weight of the user performing the activity in pounds. Must be between 50 and 500. Default value is 160.

optional_parameters.name: duration
optional_parameters.description: how long the activity was performed in minutes. Must be 1 or greater. Default value is 60 (1 hour).
